msg: Ignore SQLException thrown by the Informix implementation of
setReadOnly(), which does not support this capability.

author: craigmcc
msg: Improve the efficiency of BeanUtils.filter() by using a switch statement.

author: craigmcc
msg: Allow <bean:define> to work when the "value" attribute is set to an
arbitrary object (via a runtime expression), and the "type" attribute is
not specified.  The data type of the scripting variable being craeted will
be equal to the class of the object created by the runtime expression.
